name: Josh Simmons (@josh@josh.tel)
summary:
Beginning to think about how to approach #FOSDEM next year, as it's officially become an opportunity I can't miss. But I both value my health and can't take unnecessary risks with COVID, and I authored and signed the @phpledge@floss.social.

I foresee lots of time spent bundled up outdoors, or maybe a fringe event.

Maybe I can work with a subset of DevRoom organizers to put common sense precautions in place, such people like me can actually participate.

Hmmm... ðŸ¤”
